sense.def:
Z besedo
mean
povemo, da želimo dobiti razlago neke besede, izraza ali giba.

seg.quote: What does ‘imperialism’ mean?
What is meant by the term ‘mental activity’?

sense.def:
Z besedo
mean
povemo, na kaj se človek z besedami nanaša ali kaj hoče povedati.

seg.quote: But what do we mean by ‘education’?
I know the guy you mean.
I thought you meant you wanted to take your own car.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
means a lot to someone
, je za nekoga zelo pomembno.

seg.quote: These were the friends who had meant most to her since childhood.

sense.def:
Kadar ena stvar
means another
, kaže, da je tista druga resnična ali da se bo zanesljivo zgodila.

seg.quote: A cut in taxes will mean a cut in government spending.
Water running down the outside of a wall may mean that the gutters are blocked.

sense.def:
To mean what one says
pomeni, da določen človek govori resno in se ne šali, ne pretirava in ne govori tako samo iz vljudnosti.

seg.quote: I'm going. I mean it.
Anyone can program a computer. And I do mean anyone.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
means to do something
, tisto namerava storiti.

seg.quote: I meant to ring you but I'm afraid I forgot.
I'm sorry, I didn't mean to be rude.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
and
TO-INF
or
‘for’

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is meant to be a particular thing
ali
is meant for a particular purpose
, je to tisto, kar smo nameravali ali načrtovali.

seg.quote: Sorry, I'm not very good at drawing, but that's meant to be a cube.
‘That hurts!’—‘It's meant to!’
His smile was meant for me.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is meant to happen or exist
, predvidevamo, da se bo zgodilo ali da obstaja.

cit.quote: naj bi bilo, bi moralo biti

seg.quote: I found a road that wasn't meant to be there.

sense.def:
Meant
uporabljamo tudi, ko govorimo o slovesu nečesa.

seg.quote: They're meant to be excellent cars.

sense.def:
A means of doing something
je postopek ali pripomoček, ki nam omogoči, da tisto naredimo.
Means
je tako edninska kot množinska oblika.

seg.quote: Scientists are working to devise a means of storing this type of power.
We have the means to kill people on a massive scale.

sense.def:
Means
je tudi denar, ki ga človek ima;

seg.quote: Sutcliffe has a house in Mayfair so he obviously has means.

sense.def:
Kdor je
mean
, ni pripravljen zapraviti veliko denarja ali večje količine česa.

seg.quote: I used to be very mean about hot water.
These employers were famous for their meanness.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
mean to someone
, je do tiste osebe neprijazen.

seg.quote: She had apologized for being so mean to Rudolph.
...his meanness to his sisters.

sense.def:
V matematiki je
the mean
srednja vrednost niza števil.

seg.quote: What you do first is to calculate the mean.

sense.def:
Izraz
I mean
uporabljamo, kadar hočemo nekaj razložiti bolj razumljivo, utemeljiti tisto, kar smo že rekli, ali popraviti svoje lastne besede.

seg.quote: If you haven't any climbing boots, you can borrow them. I mean dozens of people have got boots.
This is Herbert, I mean Humbert.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
a means to an end
, tisto naredimo samo zato, ker bomo tako laže dosegli tisto, kar želimo.

Kadar nekaj naredimo
by means of a particular method or object
, to naredimo tako, da uporabimo tisto metodo ali predmet.

seg.quote: The rig is anchored in place by means of steel cables.
By all means take a day's holiday.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
by no means
poudarimo, da nekaj ni res.

seg.quote: It is by no means certain that this is what he did.
Sir George Gilbert Scott, himself no mean architect, approved the plans.
Persuading John to come was no mean feat.
